org.elastos.carrier.webrtc.util

Class WebRTCAudioManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.elastos.carrier.webrtc.util.WebRTCAudioManager

  • public class WebRTCAudioManager
extends java.lang.Object
    WebRTCAudioManager manages all audio related parts of the AppRTC demo.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  WebRTCAudioManager.AudioDevice
      AudioDevice is the names of possible audio devices that we currently support.
      static interface  WebRTCAudioManager.AudioManagerEvents
      Selected audio device change event.
      static class  WebRTCAudioManager.AudioManagerState
      AudioManager state.
